metadata.synopsis: Edenosa gets annoyed if the players go to leave the park area. She then stops following them and resets her attitude to neutral.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Spot the Cultist ambush in the park, then talk to Edenosa about it so she follows you. Then instead of heading towards the ambush, try and leave the park.

0.speaker: Manip Edenosa
0.text: Nothing. Waste my time again, and you'll find yourself acquainted with some shackles - got it?
0.context: NodeContext: Annoyed. Believes the player cried wolf about an ambush lying in wait.
